mapper.select: SELECT #{fromDate} AS fromDate, #{toDate} AS toDate, ROUND( COUNT(*) / (DATEDIFF(#{toDate}, #{fromDate}) + 1), 1 ) AS loginCount FROM request_info WHERE request_code = 'L' AND create_date >= #{fromDate} AND create_date < DATE_ADD(#{toDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)

SELECT d.dept_code AS departmentId, d.dept_name AS departmentName, DATE_FORMAT(ri.create_date, '%Y-%m') AS yearMonth, COUNT(*) AS loginCount FROM statistic.request_info ri JOIN statistic.users u ON ri.user_id = u.user_id JOIN statistic.department d ON u.dept_code = d.dept_code WHERE ri.request_code = 'L' AND ri.create_date >= CONCAT(#{fromMonth}, '-01') AND ri.create_date < DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{toMonth}, '-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY d.dept_code, d.dept_name, DATE_FORMAT(ri.create_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY d.dept_code, yearMonth
